summary: A divorced couple's teen-age daughter stands trial for stabbing her mother's latest lover.
cast: Susan Hayward|Bette Davis|Mike Connors|Joey Heatherton|Jane Greer|DeForest Kelley|George Macready|Anne Seymour|Willis Bouchey|Walter Reed|Ann Doran|Bartlett Robinson|Whit Bissell|Anthony Caruso|Jay Adler|James Bell|Nick Borgani|Walter Brooke|Bud Cokes|Roy Glenn|Jack Greening|Ralph Grosh|Sam Harris|George Holmes|John Indrisano|Jerry James|Kenner G. Kemp|Colin Kenny|Walter Woolf King|Walter Mathews|Mort Mills|Hans Moebus|Byron Morrow|Robert 'Bob' Olen|Simon Prescott|Grandon Rhodes|Leoda Richards|Lisa Seagram|Earl Spainard|Olga Sutcliffe|Russell Thorson|Howard Wendell
title: Adonde fue el amor
